Text.Page:
The witches have taken over the Malefic Laboratories and are brewing some draught. They'll use the potions to contaminate the entire castle.

, please hunt down my sister {@LinkCreature:22#19#vadoma witches} and {@LinkCreature:22#20#shadow guides} before it's too late.

If this isn't stopped, it could threaten the whole kingdom.

Good work, .

So these cauldrons are at the heart of this tragedy? But who's behind them?

I hate mysteries.
